alert.note: Alert for Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 12:59PM MDT until May 11 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in South Dakota... James River near Scotland affecting Hutchinson, Yankton and Bon Homme Counties. James River above Yankton affecting Yankton County. James River near Mitchell affecting Hanson and Davison Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River above Yankton. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, significant agricultural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 12.6 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun James River Yankton 12.0 11.6 Thu 1 pm 12.1 12.4 12.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon.
